languages.text: Чтобы переместить корабль, выберите доступную клетку на поле боя и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm} — вы увидите голограмму корабля и сможете оценить эффективность его атак и действий (так же, как при использовании голограммы в обычных боях). Повторно нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы подтвердить свой выбор и начать движение корабля. Или нажмите {console_bind|Decline}, чтобы голограмма исчезла.

To move the ship, select an accessible cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can press {console_bind|Decline} to remove the hologram.
languages.original_text: Чтобы переместить корабль, выберите доступную клетку на поле боя и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm} — вы увидите голограмму корабля и сможете оценить эффективность его атак и действий (так же, как при использовании голограммы в обычных боях). Повторно нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы подтвердить свой выбор и начать движение корабля. Или нажмите {console_bind|Decline}, чтобы голограмма исчезла.

traits.locale_text: To move the ship, select an accessible square on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just you would in regular combat. Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can press {console_bind|Decline} to remove the hologram.

To move the ship, select an accessible square on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just you would in regular combat. Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can press {console_bind|Decline} to remove the hologram.

To move the ship, select an accessible square on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can press {console_bind|Decline} to remove the hologram.

To move the ship, select an accessible cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can press {console_bind|Decline} to remove the hologram.

languages.text: Para mover la nave, elige una casilla accesible del campo de batalla y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}. Una vez lo hagas, verás un holograma de la nave que te permitirá evaluar la eficacia de los ataques y ataques futuros que lances desde esa posición como harías con el combate normal. Vuelve a pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} para confirmar tu decisión y ordenar a la nave que se mueva. Alternativamente, pulsa {console_bind|Decline} para quitar el holograma.
languages.original_text: To move the ship, select an accessible cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can press {console_bind|Decline} to remove the hologram.

traits.locale_text: Para mover la nave, elige una casilla accesible del campo de batalla y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}. Una vez lo hagas, verás un holograma de la nave que te permitirá evaluar la eficacia de los ataques y ataques futuros que lances desde esa posición como harías con el combate normal. Vuelve a pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} para confirmar tu decisión y ordenar a la nave que se mueva. Alternativamente, pulsa {console_bind|Decline} para quitar el holograma.

languages.text: 船を動かすには、戦場でアクセス可能なセルを選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。そうすると船のホログラムが表示され、通常の戦闘と同じように、その位置から今後の攻撃やアクションの効率を評価することができる。もう一度{console_bind|Confirm}を押して選択を確定し、船に移動するよう命令する。{console_bind|Decline}を押してホログラムを消すこともできる。
languages.original_text: To move the ship, select an accessible cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can press {console_bind|Decline} to remove the hologram.

traits.locale_text: 船を動かすには、戦場でアクセス可能なセルを選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。そうすると船のホログラムが表示され、通常の戦闘と同じように、その位置から今後の攻撃やアクションの効率を評価することができる。もう一度{console_bind|Confirm}を押して選択を確定し、船に移動するよう命令する。{console_bind|Decline}を押してホログラムを消すこともできる。

languages.text: 若要移动舰船，请在战场上选择不受阻挡的格子，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}。在这之后，就像普通战斗一样，您会看到舰船的全息图像，您可以在目标位置评估接下来的攻击与行动是否合适。您可以再次按下{console_bind|Confirm}，命令舰船前往目标位置。您也可以按下{console_bind|Decline}来移除全系图像。
languages.original_text: To move the ship, select an accessible cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can press {console_bind|Decline} to remove the hologram.

traits.locale_text: 若要移动舰船，请在战场上选择不受阻挡的格子，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}。在这之后，就像普通战斗一样，您会看到舰船的全息图像，您可以在目标位置评估接下来的攻击与行动是否合适。您可以再次按下{console_bind|Confirm}，命令舰船前往目标位置。您也可以按下{console_bind|Decline}来移除全系图像。

languages.text: Um das Schiff zu bewegen, wählst du ein zugängliches Feld auf dem Schlachtfeld und drückst {console_bind|Confirm}. Daraufhin siehst du ein Hologramm des Schiffes, mit dem du die Effizienz zukünftiger Angriffe und Aktionen von dieser Position aus beurteilen kannst, genau wie im normalen Kampf. Drücke erneut {console_bind|Confirm}, um deine Wahl zu bestätigen und dem Schiff zu befehlen, sich zu bewegen. Alternativ kannst du auch {console_bind|Decline} drücken, um das Hologramm zu entfernen.
languages.original_text: To move the ship, select an accessible cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can press {console_bind|Decline} to remove the hologram.

traits.locale_text: Um das Schiff zu bewegen, wählst du ein zugängliches Feld auf dem Schlachtfeld und drückst {console_bind|Confirm}. Daraufhin siehst du ein Hologramm des Schiffes, mit dem du die Effizienz zukünftiger Angriffe und Aktionen von dieser Position aus beurteilen kannst, genau wie im normalen Kampf. Drücke erneut {console_bind|Confirm}, um deine Wahl zu bestätigen und dem Schiff zu befehlen, sich zu bewegen. Alternativ kannst du auch {console_bind|Decline} drücken, um das Hologramm zu entfernen.

languages.text: Pour déplacer le vaisseau, sélectionnez une case accessible sur le champ de bataille et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Vous verrez alors apparaître un hologramme du vaisseau qui vous permettra d'évaluer l'efficacité de vos futures attaques et actions à partir de cette position, comme vous le feriez lors d'combat normal. Appuyez à nouveau sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour confirmer votre choix et ordonner au vaisseau de se déplacer. Vous pouvez également appuyer sur {console_bind|Decline} pour faire disparaître l'hologramme.
languages.original_text: To move the ship, select an accessible cell on the battlefield and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Once you do, you will see a hologram of the ship that will allow you to evaluate the efficiency of future attacks and actions from that position just as you would in regular combat. Press {console_bind|Confirm} again to confirm your choice and command the ship to move. Alternatively, you can press {console_bind|Decline} to remove the hologram.

traits.locale_text: Pour déplacer le vaisseau, sélectionnez une case accessible sur le champ de bataille et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Vous verrez alors apparaître un hologramme du vaisseau qui vous permettra d'évaluer l'efficacité de vos futures attaques et actions à partir de cette position, comme vous le feriez lors d’combat normal. Appuyez à nouveau sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour confirmer votre choix et ordonner au vaisseau de se déplacer. Vous pouvez également appuyer sur {console_bind|Decline} pour faire disparaître l'hologramme.
